attraction_reviewComments: A very delightful drive down Florence Avenue enjoying all the unique sculptures. Super creative and very resourceful and whimsical. A must for every local and visitor.

Patrick Amiott's "junk" sculptures are in front of many of the houses for several blocks. They are humorous and delightful. Take the kids!
Very West County Sonoma artistic using junk, very clever, name your favorite subject. Business and police/fire use same art too:)

Fun street with scattered sculptures. Certainly worth a detour if you are in the area. I would not suggest driving from 101 to see it as a stand alone matter.
